DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : ENERGY
DOC.TEXT: Lawsuits Exchanged in Magma Takeover_Bid : Locked_in an increasingly acrimonious takeover battle , geothermal energy producers California Energy of Omaha and Magma Power of San Diego traded lawsuits in connection with California Energy ' s unsolicited $ 840-million offer to acquire Magma.California Energy alleged in its suit that Magma violated its fiduciary responsibilities to shareholders in rebuffing its offer . Magma answered with its own suit alleging that California Energy violated federal disclosure laws relating to its tender_offer and its solicitation of proxies to force a special shareholders meeting to discuss its proposed acquisition offer . Both suits were filed_in federal_court in Reno .
